ModMetaData.name: Skull implants expansion! Prosthetics and Organs by Kkokoros!
ModMetaData.author: Kkokoros
ModMetaData.description:
Adds the ability to craft skull implants.
Adds 3 Tiers of skull implants prosthetics: builder,chef,farmer,fast learner,maid,melee soldier,miner,psychicless,rancher,range soldier,sleepless,social.
Languages added: -English
Let me know what should I add next! And help me balance everything becouse there are a lot of stats that need to be balanced :P.
Remember! If your pawn tries to install new implant(from ground) the previous one is destroyed
If you see any errors or issues. let me know in the comments.
